name: Cashinko
description:
Money Mash-Up: The explosive action of pinball collides with the intense excitement of pachinko. For real.

Join b Spot at bspot.com to wager and win.

Nail your targets, aim for the gates and win real money in
this dazzling take on a Japanese classic.

Cashinko is half arcade frenzy, half Pachinko madness.

Now do it for money. b Spot style.

Game Features:

Go for the Gates
-- Steer your steel ball through the gates to see what you’ve won.

Spot Your Winnings
-- Always find your winnings at the top of each game board.

Classic Pinball
-- Revel in classic pinball elements like flippers, bumpers and chutes.

Game Board Combos
-- Choose from 100 sleek, eye-popping backgrounds and layouts.

Power Up
-- Access 6 different power ups, depending on the day.

Challenge Yourself
-- Master various levels that require unique skills and strategy.

Winning Music
-- Pick from 3 different soundtracks to get you in the groove.

Cashinko is part of the b Spot mobile game network.

b Spot is a new and exciting way to legally gamble in the US. With $1,000s at stake, b Spot lets you Wager & Win cash while playing our growing network of arcade, action, card and puzzle games. For real.

Your money is FDIC insured. Withdraw anytime.

Stop playing for virtual currency. Start playing for real cash.
